## DragTool class

全屏拖拽

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DragTool extends ToolBase<DragToolOptions, any> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ToolBase](./core.toolbase.md)<!-- -->&lt;[DragToolOptions](./core.dragtooloptions.md)<!-- -->, any&gt;

## Example


```ts
const drag = new DragTool({
 handleId: ''
 targetId: ''
 zoom: 1
})

drag.enable()
locate('center')
```
